au-1000.title: AU-1000
au-1000.description: Reinforced robots that render attack impossible with a blast of blinding light, then slice foes silly.
au-1000.secondaryDescription: They secretly scrape shavings off gem slimes to repair their gold plating when it gets patchy.

mecha-mynah.title: Mecha-Mynah
mecha-mynah.description: Rapid, robotic birds, adept at upping their work-rate with

ailmentAffinities: 25% resistance to Dazzle, Sleep, Blunt, Sap, Decelerate, and Divine Intervention
50% resistance to Death. Immune to Stun, Poison, Paralyze, and Charm.

trauminator.title: Trauminator
trauminator.description: Senses the life force of flesh-and-blood beings, and can't stop killing until every trace is erased from its environs.
trauminator.secondaryDescription: This mad mechanical murder machine is thought to have existed since the very dawn of time itself.
